post_title: FS: T206 Evers Broad Leaf - PSA 2
post_content:
Hello,

Hate to let it go, but time to move this one. I had this posted for a short time this summer, but sold a different card, so pulled this back. But a new baby and upcoming move means Mr. Evers needs to find a new home, price adjusted!

Evers Broad Leaf 350, PSA 2 for sale - asking $5500, $500 less than what I bought it for it earlier this year. 

Only 3 PSAs of any grade! Price is net and includes shipping. DM if have any questions, thanks for looking!
Great HOF rare back. Good luck!
Thanks! It’s a tough one for sure!
Bump- putting this one back up for sale with a nice price reduction!
Bump- open to offers! This is a tough card!
